overview: In love with political candidate Anthony Cowles, heroine Nancy Blair gets wind of the opposition's scheme to ruin Cowles' reputation. At the risk of her own good name, Nancy decides to turn the tables on the crooked politicos by framing Cowles' opponent in a compromising situation. Things don't go quite as planned.
tagline: Esther Ralston's at the head of her class for clever comedy. Come learn her lesson in loving. Instructions begin at noon.
title: Love and Learn
